snippet.title: 100 Classic Games - Trailer [Nintendo DS]
snippet.description:
Description courtesy of Nintendo.com

Filled with a variety of puzzle, card, action, and board games, 100 Classic games provides hours of gameplay right at your fingertips. There's something for everyone in 100 Classic Games.

Features

• 100 Puzzle, Board, Card, and Action games!

PLATFORM: Nintendo DS
RELEASE DATE: January 3rd 2012
# OF PLAYERS: 1 Player
CATEGORY: Puzzle, Strategy
PUBLISHER: Destineer
DEVELOPER: Easy Interactive
